Stirring of Birds

Nov 12, 2014

Poetry poems

by Jon Clausen

Smile:
Stirringofbirds, a poet said.

Touch:
a shiver, a quake
known only to me.

Arms:
fire where they came rest,
instantly recalled.

Distance:
the room ceases to be.
your purpose:not me,
yet the arc exists.

Knowing:
that we will not be.
Timing was never our thing.
